varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
There is storm warning for Kangikajik, Aputiteeq, Kulusuk, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa and Nunarsuit.
There is gale warning for Daneborg, Narsalik, Meqquitsoq, Attu, and Kiatak.
There is risk of ice accretion of Daneborg, Kangikajik, Aputiteeq, Kulusuk, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa, Nunarsuit, Narsalik, Meqquitsoq, Attu and Uiffaq.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Wednesday the 10. December, 06utc.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: An area with low pressure, 940 hPa, a little northeast of Timmiarmiut is moving towards east, and another low 960 hPa over it northwestern Iceland is moving towards northeast, and gives up to hurricane along østkysten. A minor low, 995 hPa, over Melvillebugten is filling. Smaller low developes this evening over Davis Strait is movung towards southsoutheast.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: North and northeast increasing to gale, 10 to 15 m/s, strongest in southern part, and from this afternoon 13 to 20 m/s and in southern part up to 23 m/s. Especially in south- and eastern part snow showers, otherwise good visibility. Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 9 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: Storm from northeast, 20 to 30 m/s, locally up to hurricane, 35 m/s and from this afternoon northeast and north and this night a little decreasing. Snow from south. Mainly poor visibility. Locally risk of ice accretion.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 12 m. Swells: 8 m.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: Storm to hurricane from northeast, 25 to 38 m/s. Snow, sleet and later perhaps rain with moderate to poor visibility. Tuesday afternoon decreasing from west to storm from northeast and north, 18 to 28 m/s, in western part gradually gale from northwest and west, 10 to 18 m/s and some improving visibility in western part, apart from snow showers. Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 17 m. Swells: 11 m.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Storm to hurricane from north and northeast, 25 to 38 m/s. Snow and sleet and moderate to poor visibility, this afternoon from west decreasing to storm from north and northwest, 18 to 25 m/s, from this evening gale, mainly from northwest and west, 15 to 23 m/s and some improving visibility from west, apart from snow showers. Locally risk of ice accretion.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 16 m. Swells: 11 m.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: Storm, mainly from west and northwest, 25 to 30 m/s, decreasing to 15 to 25 m/s, in the afternoon northwest and west, decreasing to gale, 15 to 20 m/s, this night 10 to 15 m/s. Improving visibility from west, apart from some snow showers. Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 14 m. Swells: 10 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Storm from west, 25 to 30 m/s, from this evening decreasing to 20 to 25 m/s. Snow showers with moderate to poor visibility. Locally risk of ice accretion.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 12 m. Swells: 10 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: Storm from west and northwest, 20 to 28 m/s, this afternoon decreasing to gale, 18 to 23 m/s, and from this evening 15 to 20 m/s. Snow showers with moderate to poor visibility. Locally risk of ice accretion.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 11 m. Swells: 7 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Gale to storm from northwest, 18 to 25 m/s, decreasing to gale, 15 to 20 m/s. Some snow showers, moderate to poor visibility. Risk of ice accretion.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 9 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Gale around northwest, increasing to 18 to 23 m/s, decreasing to 15 to 20 m/s and from this afternoon or evening 10 to 15 m/s, strongest in western part. Snow showers with moderate to poor visibility, otherwise good visibility. Risk of ice accretion.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 10 m. Swells: 7 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: Gale from northwest and north, 15 to 20 m/s, this afternoon 10 to 15 m/s and this evening and this night northwest or variable, 5 to 10 m/s. Snow showers with moderate to poor visibility. Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 7 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Gale from north and northwest, decreasing to 10 to 15 m/s, this afternoon northwest, 5 to 10 m/s. Snow showers with moderate to poor visibility, otherwise good visibility. Risk of ice accretion.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Northwest and west decreasing, 8 to 13 m/s and this afternoon around west, 5 to 10 m/s from this night 3 to 8 m/s. Snow showers, otherwise good visibility. Risk of ice accretion.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 3 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: Variable or west, 3 to 8 m/s. A few snow showers, otherwise good visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1 m.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak
udsigtforkiatak.text: In northwesternmost part up to gale around north, 10 to 15 m/s, otherwise variable, 5 to 10 m/s. A few snow showers, otherwise good visibility.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: nil. Swells: nil.
